title: Molecularly imprinted polymer-based electrochemical sensors for monitoring the persistent organic pollutants chlorophenols
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,20163-20181

Ayman H. Kamel, Hisham S. M. Abd-Rabboh, A. Hefnawy
Because of the serious risks they pose to the environment and public health, chlorophenols (CPs), a typical class of the most persistent organic pollutants, have drawn increasing attention.
